repairedDockerfile:
FROM python:2.7 
MAINTAINER coopermaa77@gmail.com 

# arduino for Arduino IDE distribution 
# picocom for serial communication 
# ino is a command line toolkit for working with Arduino hardware 
RUN apt-get update && \
 apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y arduino picocom && \
 pip install --no-cache-dir ino && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

WORKDIR /app 

# Define entry point and default command. 
ENTRYPOINT ["ino"] 
CMD ["--help"]
